conbody.p: Eucalyptus uses three types of storage:

ul.li: Elastic block storage (EBS) volumes (provided by the Storage Controller)

conbody.p: Buckets and volumes keep the data across instance termination. This is called persistent storage. Volumes and ephemeral provide the familiar block interface and appear and are used as hard disks. Buckets are designed to be massively scalable. Ephemeral storage is only meant to be temporary.
